sentences: See on oluline teade kõigile töötajatele.
context: The word 'oluline' is an adjective in Estonian that means important or significant. It's used to describe something that has value, meaning, or requires attention. The word can be declined in different cases and forms: oluline (nominative singular), olulisest (elative singular), olulist (partitive singular), olulised (nominative plural), etc.
